name.fr: Suivi des leçons tirées de la NRD

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracking lessons learned in Google Sheets
short.fr: Suivi des leçons apprises dans Google Sheets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to effectively track lessons learned within the National R&D Inc. environment. It utilizes Google Sheets to record and manage vital information regarding actions and lessons learned.
